components.description: Converts a JSON string into a Java Object. A JSON object is mapped to a Java Map and a JSON array is mapped to a Java List.
Converts a Java Object into a JSON string. A Java List is mapped to a JSON Array and a Java Map is mapped to a Java Map. Any other Java object is mapped using getters.

properties.name: prettyPrint
properties.description: If true the output JSON is pretty printed using the given indent factor.
